## OpenSearchConfig.requestHeadersWhitelist property

List of OpenSearchDashboards client-side headers to send to OpenSearch when request scoped cluster client is used. If this is an empty array then \*no\* client-side will be sent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly requestHeadersWhitelist: string[];
```
